Package net.xeoh.plugins.base.util

Some utilities and wrappers for other objects / interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OptionHandler<T extends Option>
    Handles options.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JSPFProperties
    Can be used to set properties more easily.
    OptionUtils<T extends Option>
    Handles options within plugin methods.
    PluginConfigurationUtil
    Helper functions for PluginConfiguration interface.
    PluginManagerUtil
    Helper functions for PluginManager interface.
    PluginUtil
    A set of inspection methods for an existing plugin.
    VanillaPluginUtil<T extends Plugin>
    Vanilla wrapper for plugins.

Package net.xeoh.plugins.base.util Description

Some utilities and wrappers for other objects / interfaces.
